prompt: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

cards.name: Harry Potter
cards.bio: The Boy Who Lived, known for his bravery and his powerful Patronus charm.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Harry Potter with a wand and a lightning bolt shaped scar on his forehead.

cards.name: Ron Weasley
cards.bio: Harry's loyal friend, known for his strategic mind and driving the flying Ford Anglia.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Ron Weasley with red hair playing wizard's chess.

cards.name: Hermione Granger
cards.bio: One of Harry's best friends, brilliant and resourceful, with a knack for spells and potions.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Hermione Granger with bushy hair and a pile of books, casting a spell.

cards.name: Ginny Weasley
cards.bio: Youngest of the Weasley siblings, brave and strong-willed, with a talent for hexes.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Ginny Weasley with bright red hair and a determined look, holding a wand.

cards.name: Dobby
cards.bio: The free-spirited house elf with a big heart and a willingness to help Harry Potter at any cost.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Dobby the house elf with large ears and wearing a patchwork pillowcase.

cards.name: Professor Lockhart
cards.bio: The Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher, famous for his books and his narcissistic personality.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Professor Lockhart with wavy blond hair, smiling and holding his book.

cards.name: Moaning Myrtle
cards.bio: The ghost of a former Hogwarts student who haunts the girls' bathroom and enjoys wailing melodramatically.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Moaning Myrtle floating above a toilet, wearing glasses and looking forlorn.

cards.name: Tom Riddle
cards.bio: The memory of Lord Voldemort as a young Hogwarts student, cunning and manipulative.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Tom Riddle with dark hair and a mysterious diary, looking sinister.

cards.name: Fawkes
cards.bio: Dumbledore's loyal phoenix, known for its healing tears and ability to be reborn from its ashes.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Fawkes the phoenix in flames, regenerating from ashes.

cards.name: Professor McGonagall
cards.bio: Deputy Headmistress of Hogwarts, strict but fair, with a mastery of Transfiguration.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Professor McGonagall with square spectacles, holding a wand, ready to transform an object.

cards.name: Basilisk
cards.bio: The monstrous serpent dwelling within the Chamber of Secrets, controlled by the Heir of Slytherin.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: The Basilisk with giant yellow eyes and fangs dripping with venom, slithering in the Chamber of Secrets.
